item.title: The Importance of Sleep in Learning
item.description: I am writing this blog post at 11:55 AM out of a great need to express my thoughts about sleep,the tame death that envelopes us all. I find that in our modern world,sleep is often put aside,or even overlooked. I have recently found a study by the american goverment that asserts that 1 in 3 adults are chronically sleep deprived. These numbers are shocking and should make us reconsider our view on sleep.
